name: mingking-todo-workspace
description: MingKing Evil Todo List Website - Full Stack Project

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: echo 'Choose: npm run frontend:dev OR npm run backend:dev'
scripts.backend:local: cd backend && set TODO_ENV_MODE=local&& npm run dev
scripts.backend:docker: cd backend && set TODO_ENV_MODE=docker&& npm run dev
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && set NODE_ENV=production&& npm start
scripts.docker:dev: npm run db:up && echo 'Database started! Now run: npm run backend:docker'
scripts.docker:full: echo 'Full Docker setup not implemented yet - use: npm run docker:dev'
scripts.local:dev: echo 'Using Local PostgreSQL. Make sure PostgreSQL service is running!' && npm run backend:local
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:up && echo 'Setup complete! Run: npm run backend:docker'
